description: Manage image builder template output versioner.

commands.name: az image builder output versioning remove
commands.summary: Remove all versioning options on specified outputs.
commands.syntax:
az image builder output versioning remove --output-name
                                          [--defer]
                                          [--ids]
                                          [--name]
                                          [--resource-group]
                                          [--subscription]
examples: az image builder output versioning remove -n MyTemplate -g MyResourceGroup --output-name MyVhdImage --defer

commands.name: az image builder output versioning set
commands.summary: Set the image builder output versioner of an image builder template.
commands.syntax:
az image builder output versioning set --output-name
                                       --scheme {Latest, Source}
                                       [--defer]
                                       [--ids]
                                       [--major]
                                       [--name]
                                       [--resource-group]
                                       [--subscription]
examples: az image builder output versioning set -n MyTemplate -g MyResourceGroup --output-name MyVhdImage --scheme Latest --defer
az image builder output versioning set -n MyTemplate -g MyResourceGroup --output-name MyVhdImage --scheme Latest --major 1 --defer
az image builder output versioning set -n MyTemplate -g MyResourceGroup --output-name MyVhdImage --scheme Source --defer

commands.name: az image builder output versioning show
commands.summary: Show versioning options on specified outputs.
commands.syntax:
az image builder output versioning show --output-name
                                        [--defer]
                                        [--ids]
                                        [--name]
                                        [--resource-group]
                                        [--subscription]
examples: az image builder output versioning show -n MyTemplate -g MyResourceGroup --output-name MyVhdImage --defer
